text:
idney stones share many of the same signs and symptoms:
                
- burning or painful urination  - pain in the back, lower abdomen, or groin  - cloudy, dark, or bloody urine  - foul-smelling urine  - fever and chills  - vomiting
                
People who experience these symptoms should see or call a health care provider as soon as possible.",NIDDK,Medullary Sponge Kidney
